entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8.
